item.title: Defense pick Hegseth paid accuser but denies sexual assault, attorney says
item.description: Documents obtained by The Post provide extensive detail about an allegation that Pete Hegseth sexually assaulted a woman in 2017.

item.title: Trump picks fracking firm CEO Chris Wright to be energy secretary
item.description: The executive has taken a defiant approach to fighting climate change by attacking policies that call for shifting away from fossil fuels.
